trans-unit.source: Downloads service metadata.
trans-unit.target: Laster ned service metadata.

trans-unit.source: Use the MetadataExchangeClient to download metadata.
trans-unit.target: Bruk MetadataExchangeClient å laste ned metadata.

trans-unit.source: Typically, a MetadataExchangeClient is configured for a metadata request and then passed to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataResolver.Resolve%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataResolver.Resolve%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataResolver> to use to download metadata.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis en MetadataExchangeClient er konfigurert for en forespørsel om metadata og sendt til den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataResolver.Resolve%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataResolver.Resolve%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden for den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataResolver>skal brukes til å laste ned metadata.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataResolver> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataResolver.Resolve%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataResolver.Resolve%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: However, you can use the MetadataExchangeClient directly to retrieve metadata as a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> that contains <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objects.
trans-unit.target: Du kan imidlertid bruke MetadataExchangeClient direkte til å hente metadata som en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>som inneholder <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>objekter.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: Whether used directly or passed to a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataResolver>, MetadataExchangeClient has the following members to control the metadata download process: - Use the constructors to customize the binding to use when making the metadata request.
trans-unit.target: Om brukes direkte eller sendt til en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataResolver>, MetadataExchangeClient har følgende medlemmer til å kontrollere nedlastingen metadata:-Bruk av Konstruktører til å tilpasse bindingen som skal brukes når forespørselen metadata.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataResolver>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.HttpCredentials%2A> property to specify the credentials used to make an HTTP/GET request.
trans-unit.target: -Bruk av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.HttpCredentials%2A>til å angi legitimasjonen som brukes til å sende en HTTP/GET-forespørsel.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.HttpCredentials%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.SoapCredentials%2A> property to specify the credentials used to make a WS-Transfer metadata request.
trans-unit.target: -Bruk av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.SoapCredentials%2A>til å angi legitimasjonen som brukes til å be om en overføring av WS metadata.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.SoapCredentials%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.MaximumResolvedReferences%2A> property to limit the number of metadata references the MetadataExchangeClient resolves.
trans-unit.target: -Bruk av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.MaximumResolvedReferences%2A>til å begrense antall metadata refererer til MetadataExchangeClient løser.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.MaximumResolvedReferences%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.OperationTimeout%2A> property to limit the time spent retrieving metadata.
trans-unit.target: -Bruk av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.OperationTimeout%2A>til å begrense tiden som er brukt henting av metadata.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.OperationTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.ResolveMetadataReferences%2A> property to specify whether to locate and retrieve other metadata documents referred to by the metadata downloaded from the original metadata endpoint.
trans-unit.target: -Bruk av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.ResolveMetadataReferences%2A>til å angi om du vil finne og henter andre metadata dokumenter referert til av metadata som er lastet ned fra det opprinnelige metadata-endepunktet.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.ResolveMetadataReferences%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.GetMetadata%2A> methods to begin the downloading process.
trans-unit.target: -Bruk av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.GetMetadata%2A>metoder for å starte nedlasting behandle.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.GetMetadata%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can create a derived class that can override the following two protected methods: - Override the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.GetChannelFactory%2A> method to modify the channel that makes a metadata request using WS-Transfer.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg kan du opprette en utledede klassen som kan overstyre disse beskyttede metodene:-overstyre den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.GetChannelFactory%2A>metode for å endre kanalen som forespør metadata ved hjelp av WS-overføring.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.GetChannelFactory%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Override the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.GetWebRequest%2A> method to modify the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> that makes a metadata request using HTTP/GET.
trans-unit.target: -Overstyre den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.GetWebRequest%2A>metode for å endre den <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>som forespør metadata med HTTP/GET.</xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.GetWebRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient"></xref> class using the specified binding.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte bindingen.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to specify a binding to use when downloading metadata.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å angi en binding til brukes ved nedlasting av metadata.

trans-unit.source: The binding to use when retrieving metadata using WS-Transfer.
trans-unit.target: Bindingen som skal brukes under henting av metadata ved hjelp av WS-overføring.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to specify the address of the metadata endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å angi adressen for sluttpunktet metadata.

trans-unit.source: The metadata address.
trans-unit.target: Metadataadressen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to use the data from a specific endpoint configuration element to create a channel to download the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å bruke data fra en bestemt endpoint konfigurasjonselementet for å opprette en kanal for å laste ned metadataene.

trans-unit.source: The name of the endpoint configuration information to use when downloading metadata.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på endepunktet konfigurasjonsinformasjon til brukes ved nedlasting av metadata.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to specify the address and whether to use an HTTP GET request or WS-Transfer Get.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å angi adressen og om du vil bruke en HTTP GET-forespørsel eller hente WS overføring.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClientMode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClientMode?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClientMode?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The address of the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Adressen til metadataene.

trans-unit.source: The mode to use when downloading the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Modusen som skal brukes ved nedlasting av metadataene.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous method call that returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron metodekall som returnerer en <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous implementation of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.GetMetadata%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En asynkron implementering av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.GetMetadata%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.GetMetadata%2A>

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous callback delegate invoked when the call is complete.
trans-unit.target: Asynkron tilbakeringing representanten aktiveres når kallet er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The state associated with the asynchronous call.
trans-unit.target: Tilstanden tilknyttet asynkront kall.

trans-unit.source: The metadata.
trans-unit.target: Metadata.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous method call that returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> using the specified address, callback, and asynchronous state.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron metodekall som returnerer en <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> ved hjelp av den angitte adressen tilbakeringing og asynkrone tilstand.

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous implementation of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.GetMetadata%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En asynkron implementering av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.GetMetadata%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.GetMetadata%2A>

trans-unit.source: The address of the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Adressen til metadataene.

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous callback delegate invoked when the call is complete.
trans-unit.target: Asynkron tilbakeringing representanten aktiveres når kallet er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The state associated with the asynchronous call.
trans-unit.target: Tilstanden tilknyttet asynkront kall.

trans-unit.source: The metadata obtained from the specified address.
trans-unit.target: Metadataene som er hentet fra den angitte address .

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous method call that returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> using the specified address, callback, asynchronous state, and download mechanism.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron metodekall som returnerer en <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> ved hjelp av den angitte adressen, tilbakeringing asynkrone tilstand, og Last ned mekanisme.

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous implementation of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.GetMetadata%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En asynkron implementering av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.GetMetadata%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.GetMetadata%2A>

trans-unit.source: The address of the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Adressen til metadataene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClientMode"></xref> value to use when downloading the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClientMode"> </xref> verdien som skal brukes ved nedlasting av metadataene.

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous callback delegate invoked when the call is complete.
trans-unit.target: Asynkron tilbakeringing representanten aktiveres når kallet er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The state associated with the asynchronous call.
trans-unit.target: Tilstanden tilknyttet asynkront kall.

trans-unit.source: The metadata obtained from the specified address.
trans-unit.target: Metadataene som er hentet fra den angitte address .

trans-unit.source: Ends an asynchronous method call that returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Slutter et asynkront metodekall som returnerer en <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Ends one of the asynchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.BeginGetMetadata%2A> methods to return the downloaded metadata.
trans-unit.target: Slutter ett av den asynkrone <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.BeginGetMetadata%2A>metoder for å returnere nedlastede metadataene.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.BeginGetMetadata%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> object that is received from a call to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.BeginGetMetadata*> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>objekt som er mottatt fra et kall til den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.BeginGetMetadata*>metoden.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient.BeginGetMetadata*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> that contains the downloaded metadata.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> som inneholder de nedlastede metadataene.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the channel factory that is used to make the WS-Transfer metadata request.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer kanalfabrikken som brukes til å gjøre metadata WS-overføringsforespørselen når overstyres i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when retrieving metadata for a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles under henting av metadata for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference>

trans-unit.source: The metadata address.
trans-unit.target: Metadataadressen.

trans-unit.source: The dialect of the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Dialekten av metadataene.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the metadata.
trans-unit.target: IDen for metadataene.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory%601> of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel> that makes the WS-Transfer metadata request.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory%601> av typen <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel>som gjør metadata WS-overføringsforespørselen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> that contains the downloaded metadata.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> som inneholder de nedlastede metadataene.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> from the specified address.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> fra den angitte adressen.

trans-unit.source: The address from which to download the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Adressen der du kan laste ned metadataene.

trans-unit.source: The metadata located at the address.
trans-unit.target: Metadataene som er plassert i den address .

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> from the specified address and on the specified route.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> fra den angitte adressen og på den angitte ruten.

trans-unit.source: The address from which to download the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Adressen der du kan laste ned metadataene.

trans-unit.source: The URI address that represents the route a message takes.
trans-unit.target: URI-adressen som representerer ruten tar en melding.

trans-unit.source: The metadata that is downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Metadataene som er lastet ned.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> from the specified address using the specified download mode.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> fra den angitte adressen ved hjelp av angitte nedlastingsmodus.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to specify the address and whether to use HTTP GET or WS-Transfer Get to download the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å angi adressen og om å bruke HTTP GET eller WS overføring hente å laste ned metadataene.

trans-unit.source: The address from which to download the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Adressen der du kan laste ned metadataene.

trans-unit.source: The download mechanism to use.
trans-unit.target: Last nedlastingsmekanisme skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: The metadata that is downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Metadataene som er lastet ned.

trans-unit.source: Returns an asynchronous metadata set.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer et sett med asynkrone metadata.

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous metadata set.
trans-unit.target: Asynkron metadataene angitt.

trans-unit.source: Returns an asynchronous metadata set from the specified address.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en asynkron metadata fra den angitte adressen.

trans-unit.source: The address from which to download the asynchronous metadata
trans-unit.target: Adressen der du kan laste ned den asynkrone metadata

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous metadata located at the address.
trans-unit.target: Asynkron metadata på adressen.

trans-unit.source: Returns an asynchronous metadata set from the specified address and on the specified route.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en asynkron metadata angi fra den angitte adressen og på den angitte ruten.

trans-unit.source: The address from which to download the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Adressen der du kan laste ned metadataene.

trans-unit.source: The URI address that represents the route a message takes.
trans-unit.target: URI-adressen som representerer ruten tar en melding.

trans-unit.source: The metadata that is downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Metadataene som er lastet ned.

trans-unit.source: Returns an asynchronous metadata set from the specified address using the specified download mode.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en asynkron metadata fra den angitte adressen ved hjelp av angitte nedlastingsmodus.

trans-unit.source: The address from which to download the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Adressen der du kan laste ned metadataene.

trans-unit.source: The download mechanism to use.
trans-unit.target: Last nedlastingsmekanisme skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: The metadata that is downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Metadataene som er lastet ned.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> used to make HTTP/GET metadata requests.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, returnerer den <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>brukes til å opprette HTTP/hente metadata forespørsler.</xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>

trans-unit.source: The GetWebRequest method is called: - When there is an attempt to resolve a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetWebRequest kalles: – når det gjøres forsøk på å løse <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - When <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClientMode?displayProperty=fullName> is used.
trans-unit.target: -Når <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClientMode?displayProperty=fullName>brukes.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClientMode?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The location of the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av metadataene.

trans-unit.source: The dialect of the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Dialekten av metadataene.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the metadata.
trans-unit.target: IDen for metadataene.

trans-unit.source: The internal <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> used to make HTTP GET metadata requests.
trans-unit.target: Den interne <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>brukes til å gjøre HTTP metadata innhentingsforespørsler.</xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the credentials used to make an HTTP/GET request.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir legitimasjonen som brukes til å sende en HTTP/GET-forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: Use the HttpCredentials property to customize the security credentials that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient> uses when requesting metadata using HTTP/GET.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen HttpCredentials tilpasse sikkerheten legitimasjon som den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient>bruker når du ber om metadata ved hjelp av HTTP/GET.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.ICredentials> object used to establish the request credentials.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.ICredentials>objektet brukes til å opprette forespørselen legitimasjonen.</xref:System.Net.ICredentials>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of references to metadata that the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient"></xref> downloads.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir det maksimale antallet referanser til metadata som i <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient"> </xref> ned.

trans-unit.source: Use the MaximumResolvedReferences property to limit the resources accessed by metadata that contains a large number of references.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen MaximumResolvedReferences til å begrense ressurser tilgang til metadataene som inneholder et stort antall referanser.

trans-unit.source: This limit applies to any reference in the metadata that results in a subsequent request, including metadata references, metadata locations, WSDL imports, and XML Schema imports and includes.
trans-unit.target: Denne begrensningen gjelder referanser i metadataene som fører til en etterfølgende forespørsel, inkludert metadatareferanser, plasseringene metadata, WSDL importerer og XML-skjema importerer og inkluderer.

trans-unit.source: The number of metadata references the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient"></xref> resolves.
trans-unit.target: Antall metadatareferanser i <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient"> </xref> løser.

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.
trans-unit.target: Standard er 10.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the period of time within which the metadata must be downloaded before an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tiden metadataene må lastes ned før det et unntak som.

trans-unit.source: Use the OperationTimeout property to limit the amount of time the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient> takes before ending the operation.
trans-unit.target: Bruke OperationTimeout-egenskapen til å begrense hvor lang tid det <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient>tar før operasjonen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient>

trans-unit.source: The period within which the metadata must be downloaded; the default is 1 minute.
trans-unit.target: Perioden metadataene må lastes ned som; standard er 1 minutt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that controls whether references to metadata are resolved.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som bestemmer om referanser til metadata er løst.

trans-unit.source: Set the ResolveMetadataReferences property to `false` to prevent the resolution of references to metadata.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen ResolveMetadataReferences `false` å hindre løsing av referanser til metadata.

trans-unit.source: In this case, references are returned as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation?displayProperty=fullName> objects inside the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet returneres referanser som <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation?displayProperty=fullName>objekter i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if references to metadata are resolved; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis referanser til metadata er løst; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the client security credentials used to make a WS-Transfer metadata request.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir klienten sikkerheten legitimasjonen som brukes til å be om en overføring av WS metadata.

trans-unit.source: Use the SoapCredentials property to specify the security credentials the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient> uses when making a WS-Transfer metadata request.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen SoapCredentials til å angi sikkerhetsinformasjonen den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient>bruker når du foretar en forespørsel om overføring av WS-metadata.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient>

trans-unit.source: The client security credentials used to make a WS-Transfer metadata request.
trans-unit.target: Klient-sikkerhetsinformasjon som brukes til å be om en overføring av WS metadata.
